scripts.typecheck: pnpm -C sdk/typescript typecheck && ./scripts/python-dev.sh -m mypy relay/python/aether_relay sdk/python/aether
scripts.test: pnpm -C sdk/typescript test && ./scripts/python-dev.sh -m pytest relay/python/tests sdk/python/tests
scripts.verify:ts-package: pnpm -C sdk/typescript build && pnpm -C sdk/typescript pack
